x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Open Space Editor when clicking on space record will just spin and spin and spin and not load the space record.
Check console log on browser for error message: Uncaught ErrorType : Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'value') (Attached error image for reference)
Steps to reproduce :
-Open floor -Launch Space Editor -Click on space in space editor
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Space Editor spins not load space record
x_nuvo_diag_probes.script:
var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
util.handleOutput('When open Space Editor clicking on space record, it just spin and spin and spin and not load the space record. Check if there is any error on browser console like "Uncaught ErrorType : Cannot read properties of undefined (reading value)". If yes, reach out to Nuvolo Technical Engineering team for update set regarding the zone issue, and install it.', 'Warning','Space');
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Space Editor spins not load space record
